title: Twitter for iOS now lets you easily create GIFs using your iPhone camera
content:
Today, Twitter announces it’s launching a new way for users to post their own GIFs by creating them with the in-app camera on iOS devices.

more…

The post Twitter for iOS now lets you easily create GIFs using your iPhone camera appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Today, Twitter announces it's launching a new way for users to post their own GIFs by creating them with the in-app camera on iOS devices.
